JGAL

Class GAL_Population

  • java.lang.Object
    • JGAL.GAL_Population

  • public class GAL_Population
extends java.lang.Object
    The GAL_Population represents the population of chromosomes for a generation

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected GAL_Chromosome[] chromosomes
      The chromosomes that represents the population

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Constructs a new GAL_Population from an array of chromosomes.

      Constructs a new GAL_Population from an array of chromosomes given by the first parameter under the configuration of the second parameter.
        GAL_Population(int size, GAL_ChromosomeConfig config)
      Constructs a new GAL_Population of size given by the first parameter using the chromosome configuration.

        protected GAL_Chromosome[] chromosomes

    • Constructor Detail

      • GAL_Population

        public GAL_Population(int size,
              GAL_ChromosomeConfig config)
               throws NotValidChromosomeException,
                      NotValidPopulationException
        Constructs a new GAL_Population of size given by the first parameter using the chromosome configuration.
        Parameters:
        size - The number of chromosomes in the population.
        config - The configuration used for the creation of the new chromosomes.
        Throws:
        NotValidChromosomeException - If the configuration has an empty gene configuration.
        NotValidPopulationException - If the size is less than 1.

      • GAL_Population

        public GAL_Population(GAL_Chromosome[] chromosomes,
              GAL_ChromosomeConfig config)
               throws NotValidChromosomeException,
                      NotValidPopulationException
        Constructs a new GAL_Population from an array of chromosomes given by the first parameter under the configuration of the second parameter.
        Parameters:
        chromosomes - The array of chromosomes to be inserted at the population.
        config - The configuration for the chromosomes.
        Throws:
        NotValidChromosomeException - If the array of chromosomes does not match with the configuration.
        NotValidPopulationException - If the length of the array of chromosomes is less than 1.

      • GAL_Population

        protected GAL_Population(GAL_Chromosome[] chromosomes)
        Constructs a new GAL_Population from an array of chromosomes.
        Parameters:
        chromosomes - The array of chromosomes to be inserted at the population.
